Articles.Content: I wanna loaded much of graphics and realism mods, and play around. First thing I wanna know is which is is harder to run RSSVE High Resolution 4K or PRVE regular

ultimately, it is really up to testing to figure out which one works better.  I prefer RSSVE High Res, when I run an RSS install, but it really depends on your personal computer's abilities, including graphics card age and processor capabilities.
